find.title: Account Recovery
find.pageInfo: Use a recovery information saved in account details to recover your account.

EmailFindText.after: We found the following address. We only show first 4 letters due to privacy concerns
EmailFindText.before: You can find out your email address. But first verify using one of the below methods.

done.title: Password changed
done.message: Password Changed. Log in again using your new password.

error.title: Failed to reset password
error.multiple: You cannot reuse old passwords to reset password.
error.etc: Failed to reset password. Please try again later.

find.number: Use registered phone number to find out the email you reigstered with.
find.feedbackInfo: Verification code is sent to an email address you used to register.

authText.after: Resetting your password. Log in again using your new password.

authInput.placeholder: Enter verification code that is sent to your email.
authInput.rule: Enter a password between 8 and 20 characters by combining uppercase/lowercase letters numbers and special characters (.!@#$%).

notSync.title: Entered detail does not appear to be valid
notSync.message: The information you entered does not match our records

etc.title: Failed to send your account detail
etc.message: Failed to send your account detail. Please try it later.

send.title: Verification code is sent
send.message: The verification code is sent to an email address you registered with. Check the verification code from your email.

error.sendMessage: Entered verification code does not match please try again
error.authMessage: Failed to verify please try again later
error.nobody: The information you entered does not match our records
error.rulePassMessage: Your password must be between 8 and 20 characters long. Your password needs to be included with at least 4 of following character types. - Uppercase letter - Lowercase letter- Number - Special character ( .  ! @ # $ % ). Also your password must not contain consecutive numbers and more than four of same characters.
error.timeOut: Due to security reasons the verification code can only be sent again after 1 minute has passed. Check you email or try again some time later.
error.etc: Failed to send a verification code to your email please try again later.
